articles.title: COVID-19 may affect the entire nervous system of patients: Beware of these symptoms - TheHealthSite
articles.description: Neurologic symptoms like headaches seizures and strokes may precede fever cough or respiratory problems in COVID-19 infection say researchers.
articles.content: COVID-19 virus is more powerful than you could possibly imagine. The virus can affect the entire nervous system, including the brain, spinal cord, nerves, and the muscles of infected individuals and … [+3783 chars]
